feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correction of French translations by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1907
  • Allow installation of the debug build by @mintsoft in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1906
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1916
  • APKPure: Fix issue with characters in URLs (#1912)
  • APKPure: Fix bug with versionCode not found
  • Optional "when charging only" toggle for BG updates (#1914)
  • Update hungarian translation - hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1917

New Contributors

  • @mintsoft made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1906

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.27...v1.1.28

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.29
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correction of last French modifications (too long) by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1918
  • Update Polish translation by @Daviteusz in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1929
  • Add Custom app ID by @InfiniteCoder06 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1915
  • Translation fix, Flutter/package updates, GitHub action security improvement by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1940
  • Updated a few strings - assets/translations/da.json by @catsnote in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1938
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1941
  • Fix PathAccessException on secondary profiles (#1754)
    • Thanks to @Diego-Visualma for the solution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Shoyo/pull/4
  • Log installs (#1924)
  • APKPure URL parsing bugfix (#1926)
  • Remove Signal source (HTML is enough) (#1928)
  • F-Droid URL parsing bugfix (#1933)
  • HTML link extraction bugfix (#1937)

New Contributors

  • @InfiniteCoder06 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1915

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.28...v1.1.29

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correction of long translations (French) by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1945
  • Update es.json by @CertainBot in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1948
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1962
  • Uptodown - fix broken web scraping logic (#1956)
  • Add signature info to README (#1957)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.29...v1.1.30

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.31
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1964
  • Update ja.json by @bluefly000 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1965
  • Update README.md by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1972
  • Bugfixes for the "download release assets" button (#1968) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1975

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.30...v1.1.31

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.32
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1977
  • Update wiki links by @Hamster45105 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1980
  • Minor change to German translation (#1986) by @PrivacyAndSecurity in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1990
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1990
  • Improved XAPK Support (#682)
  • Custom user-agent for APKMirror (as per feedback in #1973)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.31...v1.1.32
